songs.title: The Edge of Glory/Judas/Aura/Sexxx Dreams/Mary Jane Holland/Alejandro (artRAVE paris version)
songs.lyrics:

GAGA
GAGA

NOW JUMP! RAVEE!!! YEEEAHHH!!!

Last night

I'd like to dedicate this song to my new singing partner, from my new record Cheek To Cheek
